thread.title: Staidson Beijing BioPharmaceuticals unit to invest in Beijing-based firm and limited partnership

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Staidson Beijing BioPharmaceuticals unit to invest in Beijing-based firm and limited partnership

organizations.name: reuters) - staidson beijing biopharmaceuticals co ltd

text:
Feb 13(Reuters) - Staidson Beijing BioPharmaceuticals Co Ltd
* Says coâ€™s Zhejiang-based wholly owned investment unit plans to invest 30 million yuan in Beijing-based medical science and technology development firm (target firm)
* Says unit will hold 5 percent stake in target firm
* Says unit plans to invest 35.5 million yuan in a limited partnership for portion worth 7.8 million yuan
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/aFWS6W ; goo.gl/ArVSG1
